name: Terrible Temple
description:
The Game

You play as a tiny goblin trying to hide from the evil mage who is attacking you, and end up in a temple  joined together with the mage. Collect the runes and escape the temple.

Credits

PizzArt - code, level design, art, sound effects

TeaWhyDee - cutscenes, character design and sprites

Note: this was our first time making a game in 48 hours (instead of 72 hours), so the game is very unfinished in some places.
